features: 【Suitable for OVEN cooking】:The body can be used in the oven (below 230 degrees). Bread and muffins can be easily baked and the fun of cooking spreads. The main body of GOURLAB is made of a special resin called "syndiotactic polystyrene". It is strong against impact and durable, and the heat-resistant temperature is 230. It does not deform even with the oil content of meat and fish, making it possible to cook chicken steaks, spare ribs, and other dishes that use a lot of oil.

【JAPANESE QUALITY MICROWAVE STEAMER】 : In one container, you can perform multiple steps because have PATENTED HEATING STRUCTURE.This Japan kitchen gadget has a structure that controls the steam similar to a pressure cooker,when the food is cooked in a microwave steamer for cooking. You can also cook in the oven by removing the lid.

【HEALTHY COOKWARE】 : It supports heIalthy cooking.Use GOURLAB and easily change the dishes you eat and your diet.Equipped with an Oil filter,you can remove excess oil from various dishes.Of course, it is also ideal for vegetable steamer.

【6 COOKING STYLES in 1 CONTAINER】:EASY & QUICK!! You can also cook 6-in-1 using this microwave cooker, baking, boiling, stir-fry, steaming, rice cooker. You can cook as if you were using fire.And this Japan product is as a Japanese gift too. Ramen, Pasta, Vegetables, Chicken, Beef, and More.

Heatproof temperature: 450℉/Body 320℉/Cover, Cold resistant temperature: -40℉/Body & Cover, Can also be used in the oven(other than the lid), and be stored frozen.So suitable for food storage container.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can I really cook in the oven with GOURLAB? The most attractive thing is that it can withstand the oven heating because it uses a special plastic container that has acquired a patent. In general, many range cookers are “only for ranges”. However, Guru Lab is compatible with high-temperature oven cooking at 230°C by removing the lid. It is also perfect for bread, sweets, and gratin that you want to bake crispy. It's very convenient because you can remove the lid and put it in the oven to bake without having to bother to transfer it to another mold. The GOURLAB, which can be used in both the microwave and the oven, is also recommended for making bread. After mixing the ingredients in the GOURLAB, you can heat it in the microwave and ferment it. If you close the attached lid, you don't have to worry about the fabric drying out. Can be frozen!! With a cold resistance of -40°C, you can also make sherbet and ice cream. If you freeze the ingredients while seasoning them, all you have to do is heat them up in the microwave and the dish will be ready in no time! Did you know that Guru Lab can also make ice cream? Everything from melting the ingredients to mixing and freezing can be completed with one Guru Lab! It also reduces laundry stress. Japanese Gourmet recipes With cooking recipe book! !! There are cooking recipes for various cooking methods in Japan. Now you can try cooking right away. There is no problem even for people who are not good at cooking. Because you just put it in the microwave or oven and press a button. Get a life where you can eat more delicious food while shortening the cooking time.
GOURLAB Plus(Black) GOURLAB Plus(White) GOURLAB Multi set GOURLAB Plus(carrot orange) Oven Cooking ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Frozen Storage ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Recipe Book ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multipurpose Microwave Cookware. Perfect for RV
reviews.reviewText: Saw the ad on FB on this microwave cookware. It attracts my attention because it’s not just a container for storing /reheating. It cooks food! I have tried to cook chicken breast with it and it's fully cook in only 5 mins. It's a Japanese brand. The patent design with a tiny opening on 1 side allows the air to circulate just right. It's also very quick to cook vegetables (in about 3 mins). Save me tons of time and water to boil. For sure I'm going to take the set with me to my next RV trip.It also come with a recipe book, next time I will experiment with bread making

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product and well designed.
reviews.reviewText: Well made and happy good results using this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
reviews.reviewText: I've made perfect el dente pasta multiple times in this thing, I couldn't believe it. Ramen is also a breeze. Looking forward to seeing it do all the other stuff as well. Comes with recipes catered to this contraption!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars bought by mistake
reviews.reviewText: I returned it I had another one. What can I say.I'm 83 another senior moment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great item until I discovered the price is stiff and there are so many available glass containers for that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy as a rice cooker
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed with this product. Bought it specifically for microwaving rice. Instructions don’t include how to microwave just plain rice although it’s tauted to be a rice cooker. The best calculation for cooking rice is one cup of rice - two cups water - at power 5 for 3 minute intervals or you will end up with rice water all over your microwave. My microwave is 750 watts. Always put product in pan in microwave. Otherwise you have a sticky mess. Better yet - don’t buy until manufacturer cleans up instruction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs to be bigger, if cooking for a family.
reviews.reviewText: It was smaller than I was expecting, needs to be bigger, but I cooked spaghetti, steamed cauliflower in it. I haven't used it for meats, but if it was bigger, I would use it more was a little disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it everyday to cook breakfast, lunch and dinner. just one box in 15 mins cooking done. Super easy super fast. Save time washing up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Ok...ish. A bit hyped up with posh name!
reviews.reviewText: Basically a plastic pot with a slotted tray in the bottom and a lid that has a steam vent.Nice little cook book that tells you how to do everything ....except cook rice! .......which it does not do well, so just add pre cooked rice to the pot.Microwave still ends up soaked incondensation.I have found it very useful for steaming veggies and fish.Perfect size for one person meals.
万能保存容器ですね。我が家ではいつも毎日、冷蔵庫で活躍しています。時々、子どもが総菜を入れて持ち帰る事もあります。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to clean, multi-purposed. The plastic is good in quality and does not stained.
